specifications.Care Advice: Knit When you receive a knit product, it may be stiff and wrinkled. This is because the fabric has been folded and compressed for shipping. To soften and straighten the fabric, you should condition it for 2-3 days at room temperature before using it.
specifications.Care Instructions: Machine wash cold / Gentle Wash with similar colors Turn inside out before washing Do not bleach Line dry Do not tumble dry Do not iron Sustainability Eco-fiber > Recycled Yarn Recycled yarn is a special type of yarn manufactured from waste textiles and other materials. This kind of yarn is created from waste materials, such as plastic bottles, as well as 'textile-to-textile' waste. Brand Yarn regen® regen® is a reclaimed polyester yarn made by recycling pre-consumer waste. Recommended Use Activewear, Dresses, T-shirts
